scripts.dist: (set ELECTRON_MIRROR=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/ && set npm_config_disturl=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/headers && set ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron-builder-binaries/ && electron-rebuild -f -w selection-hook) && (set ELECTRON_MIRROR=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/ && set ELECTRON_BUILDER_BINARIES_MIRROR=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron-builder-binaries/ && electron-builder)
